trans-unit.source: A string with a date and a time component.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有日期和時間元件。

trans-unit.source: A string with a date but no time component.
trans-unit.target: 含日期，但沒有時間部分的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the time component is absent, the method assumes 12:00 midnight.
trans-unit.target: 如果時間元件不存在，則方法會假設午夜 12:00。

trans-unit.source: If the date component has a two-digit year, it is converted to a year based on the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the current culture's current calendar or the specified culture's current calendar (if you use an overload with a non-null `provider` argument).
trans-unit.target: 如果日期元件有兩位數年份，則會轉換為根據的年份<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>目前文化特性的現行曆法或指定的文化特性的現行曆法的 (如果您使用多載具有非 null`provider`引數)。

trans-unit.source: A string with a date component that includes only the month and the year but no day component.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含只月份和年份的日期元件，但沒有日期元件。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the first day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 方法會假設每月的第一天。

trans-unit.source: A string with a date component that includes only the month and the day but no year component.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含只月和日的日期元件，但沒有年元件。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the current year.
trans-unit.target: 方法會假設目前的年份。

trans-unit.source: A string with a time but no date component.
trans-unit.target: 具有一次，但沒有日期元件的字串。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the current date unless you call the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload and include <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the `styles` argument, in which case the method assumes a date of January 1, 0001.
trans-unit.target: 方法會假設目前的日期，除非您呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>多載，並包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`styles`引數，在其中案例方法假設年 1 月 1 日 0001。

trans-unit.source: A string with a time component that includes only the hour and an AM/PM designator, with no date component.
trans-unit.target: 具有時間元件，其中包含在一小時和 AM/PM 指示項，與沒有日期元件的字串。

trans-unit.source: The method assumes the current date and a time with no minutes and no seconds.
trans-unit.target: 方法會假設目前的日期和時間不分鐘和不含秒數。

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload and include <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the `styles` argument, in which case the method assumes a date of January 1, 0001.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更此行為，藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>多載，並包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`styles`引數，在其中案例方法假設年 1 月 1 日 0001。

trans-unit.source: A string that includes time zone information and conforms to ISO 8601.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含時區資訊，並符合 ISO 8601 標準。

trans-unit.source: In the following examples, the first string designates Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), and the second designates the time in a time zone that's seven hours earlier than UTC:
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，第一個字串代表國際標準時間 (UTC)，而第二個指定為七個小時的時區的時間早於 UTC:

trans-unit.source: A string that includes the GMT designator and conforms to the RFC 1123 time format; for example:
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含 GMT 指示項，並符合 RFC 1123 時間格式。例如：

trans-unit.source: A string that includes the date and time along with time zone offset information; for example:
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含的日期和時間以及時區位移資訊。例如：

trans-unit.source: The following example parses strings in each of these formats by using the formatting conventions of the current culture, which in this case is the en-US culture:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用目前的文化特性，在此案例中是 EN-US 文化特性的格式化慣例來剖析每一種格式的字串：

trans-unit.source: If the input string represents a leap day in a leap year in the calendar used by the parsing method (see [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)), the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method parses the string successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的字串代表在閏年中使用之曆法所剖析的方法為閏日 (請參閱[剖析和文化特性的慣例](#Culture))、<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法已成功剖析字串。

trans-unit.source: If the input string represents a leap day in a non-leap year, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的字串代表為閏日在非為閏年，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time by using the formatting rules of the current or a specified culture, trying to parse a string across different cultures can fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法會嘗試剖析日期字串表示法，並使用目前或指定的文化特性，嘗試將字串剖析跨不同的文化特性的格式規則的時間可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: To parse a specific date and time format across different locales, use one of the overloads of the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and provide a format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要分為不同的地區設定特定的日期和時間格式，使用其中一個多載的<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，並提供的格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Parsing and cultural conventions
trans-unit.target: 剖析和文化特性的慣例

trans-unit.source: All overloads of the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method are culture-sensitive unless the string to be parsed (which is represented by `s` in the following table) conforms to the ISO 8601 pattern.
trans-unit.target: 所有多載<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法有區分文化特性除非要剖析的字串 (這由`s`下表) 符合 ISO 8601 模式。

trans-unit.source: The parsing operation uses the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is derived as follows:
trans-unit.target: 剖析作業所使用的格式設定資訊中<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件衍生，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If you call
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫

trans-unit.source: And `provider` is
trans-unit.target: 和`provider`是

trans-unit.source: Formatting information is derived from
trans-unit.target: 格式設定資訊衍生自

trans-unit.source: The current thread culture (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property)
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒文化特性 (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: The current thread culture (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property)
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒文化特性 (<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> or <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> 或 <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>

trans-unit.source: Custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法

trans-unit.source: When formatting information is derived from a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the calendar used in the parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 當格式化資訊衍生自<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義剖析作業中使用的曆法。

trans-unit.source: If you parse a date and time string by using a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object with customized settings that are different from those of a standard culture, use the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method to improve the chances for a successful conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用剖析日期和時間字串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件自訂是不同於標準的文化特性的設定，請使用<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法，以改善成功轉換的機率。

trans-unit.source: A non-standard date and time string can be complicated and difficult to parse.
trans-unit.target: 非標準的日期和時間字串可以是複雜且難以剖析。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method tries to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法會嘗試剖析的字串與數個隱含剖析模式，其中可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> method requires you to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>方法需要您明確地指定一或多個正確剖析模式，可能會成功。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "DateTimeFormatInfo and Dynamic Data" section in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < DateTimeFormatInfo 和動態資料 > 一節<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>主題。

trans-unit.source: Note that the formatting conventions for a particular culture are dynamic and can be subject to change.
trans-unit.target: 請注意的特定文化特性的格式化慣例是動態的而且可能會受到變更的影響。

trans-unit.source: This means that parsing operations that depend on the formatting conventions of the default (current) culture or that specify an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> object that represents a culture other than the invariant culture can unexpectedly fail if any of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 這取決於預設值 （目前） 的文化特性或格式設定慣例的剖析作業指定的意義<xref:System.IFormatProvider>代表文化特性而異的文化特性以外的物件可能會發生下列任何一個非預期地失敗：

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data has changed between major or minor versions of the .NET Framework or as the result of an update to the existing version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 的或現有的.NET framework 版本的更新結果的主要或次要版本之間已經變更的特定文化特性的資料。

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data reflects user preferences, which can vary from machine to machine or session to session.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的資料會反映使用者喜好設定，所以可能會從電腦或工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data represents a replacement culture that overrides the settings of a standard culture or a custom culture.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的資料代表取代文化特性來覆寫標準的文化特性或自訂的文化特性設定。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the difficulties in parsing data and time strings that are associated with changes in cultural data, you can parse date and time strings by using the invariant culture, or you can call the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> or <xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A> method and specify the exact format of the string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免在剖析日期和時間字串文化特性的資料變更與相關聯的問題，您可以使用文化特性而異，剖析日期和時間字串，或您可以呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>或<xref:System.DateTime.TryParseExact%2A>方法並指定確切的格式要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: If you are serializing and deserializing date and time data, you can either use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture, or you can serialize and deserialize the <xref:System.DateTime> value in a binary format.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要序列化和還原序列化時的日期和時間資料，您可以使用的格式設定慣例的文化特性而異，或您可以序列化和還原序列化<xref:System.DateTime>二進位格式值。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the "Dynamic culture data" section in the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> topic and the "Persisting DateTime values" section in the <xref:System.DateTime> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 動態文化特性資料 」 一節<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>主題和 < Persisting DateTime 值 > 一節中<xref:System.DateTime>主題。

trans-unit.source: Parsing and style elements
trans-unit.target: 剖析和樣式項目

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> overloads ignore leading, inner, or trailing white-space characters in the input string (which is represented by `s` in the following table).
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>多載會忽略輸入字串中的前置字元、 內部或尾端空格字元 (這由`s`下表中)。

trans-unit.source: The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ("#", U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000).
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間可以是以一組的開頭和尾端數字符號字元 （"#"、 U + 0023），而且必須尾隨一或多個 NULL 字元 (U + 0000)。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> overload has a `styles` parameter that consists of one or more members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>多載具有`styles`組成的一或多個成員的參數<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: This parameter defines how `s` should be interpreted and how the parse operation should convert `s` to a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會定義如何`s`應解譯和剖析作業應該如何將轉換`s`日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the effect of each <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> member on the parse operation.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個效果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>成員在剖析作業。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成員

trans-unit.source: Effect on conversion
trans-unit.target: 在轉換的效果

trans-unit.source: Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 剖析`s`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: - If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal> flag, the method parses the string, calls <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> to convert the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value to UTC, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: -如果`s`包含時區時差，或如果`s`未包含任何時區資訊但`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>旗標，方法會剖析字串，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>轉換傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為UTC 和集合<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: - If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal> flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: -如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或如果`s`不含時區資訊但`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>旗標，方法會剖析字串，不執行時區轉換針對傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值，並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: - In all other cases, the flag has no effect.
trans-unit.target: -在所有其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Inner white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 內部空白字元一律允許的日期和時間項目中`s`。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Leading white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 在日期和時間的項目中，則一律允許前置空白字元`s`。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Trailing white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 在日期和時間的項目一律允許尾端泛空白字元`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces.
trans-unit.target: 指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端空白字元。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration value such as <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None>.
trans-unit.target: 無法藉由提供更具限制性覆寫<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉值，例如<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, local time is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，而本機時間會假設。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal> flag is present, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal>旗標已存在，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, UTC is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 指定當`s`缺少會假設 UTC 任何時區資訊。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal> flag is present, the method converts the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value from UTC to local time and sets its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal>旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值與 utc 之間的當地時間和設定其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 雖然有效，但會忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion of a date and time string to a <xref:System.DateTime> value that represents a local time with its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 包含時區資訊的字串，請嘗試避免轉換的日期和時間字串的<xref:System.DateTime>值以本地時間表示其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, such a string is created by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and by using the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，此類字串會藉由呼叫建立<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法也可以使用"o"、"r"或"u"標準格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The return value and DateTime.Kind
trans-unit.target: 傳回值和 DateTime.Kind

trans-unit.source: The `DateTime.Parse` overloads return a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind> property includes time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `DateTime.Parse`多載會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind>屬性包含時區資訊。

trans-unit.source: It can indicate that the time is:
trans-unit.target: 它可以表示的時間是：

trans-unit.source: Coordinated Universal Time (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 國際標準時間 (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=fullName>)。

trans-unit.source: The time in the local time zone (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 本地時區的時間 (<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=fullName>)。

trans-unit.source: The time in an unknown time zone (xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 未知的時區中的時間 (xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=fullName >)。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> object whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>物件，其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method may also perform time zone conversion and set the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property differently, depending on the values of the `s` and `styles` parameters:
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>方法可能會執行時區轉換，並設定的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性依據的值不同，`s`和`styles`參數：

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: 如果

trans-unit.source: Time zone conversion
trans-unit.target: 進行時區轉換

trans-unit.source: Kind property
trans-unit.target: Kind 屬性

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含時區資訊。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is converted to the time in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間會以當地時區轉換為時間。

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information, and `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含時區資訊和`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間會轉換為國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: `s` contains the Z or GMT time zone designator, and `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含 Z 或 GMT 時區指示項，並`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The date and time are interpreted as UTC.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間會解譯為 UTC。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts date strings that contain time zone information to the time in the local time zone:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將包含本地時區的時區資訊的時間的日期字串轉換：

trans-unit.source: You can also preserve the value of a date and time's <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property during a formatting and parsing operation by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以保留的日期和時間的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性的格式設定和使用剖析作業期間<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind> flag affects the parsing operation on <xref:System.DateTime> values that are converted to strings by using the "o", "r", or "u" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind>旗標會影響在剖析作業上<xref:System.DateTime>使用"o"、"r"或"u"格式規範來轉換為字串的值。

trans-unit.source: Numerous examples that call the `DateTime.Parse` method are interspersed throughout the [Remarks](#remarks) section of this article and in the documentation for the individual `DateTime.Parse` overloads.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的數個範例`DateTime.Parse`方法散佈整個[備註](#remarks)這篇文章和個別的文件中一節`DateTime.Parse`多載。

trans-unit.source: You can also download a complete set of `DateTime.Parse` examples, which are included in a [.NET Core 2.0 project for C#](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/csharp/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip) and a [.NET Core 2.0 project for Visual Basic](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/visualbasic/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip), from the [dotnet/docs GitHub repository](https://github.com/dotnet/docs).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以下載完整的`DateTime.Parse`範例中所包含的[C#.NET Core 2.0 專案](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/csharp/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip)和[適用於 Visual Basic.NET Core 2.0 專案](https://github.com/dotnet/docs/raw/master/samples/snippets/visualbasic/downloads/api/System/DateTime.Parse.zip)，從[dotnet/文件GitHub 儲存機制](https://github.com/dotnet/docs)。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: See [The string to parse](#StringToParse) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[要剖析的字串](#StringToParse)。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent by using the conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前執行緒文化特性的慣例，將日期和時間的字串表示轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time zone information, this method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts the date and time in `s` to local time.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時區資訊，此方法會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，並將轉換的日期和時間在`s`本地時間。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it performs no time zone conversion and returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會執行任何時區轉換並傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This overload attempts to parse `s` by using the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載嘗試剖析`s`使用目前文化特性的格式設定慣例。

trans-unit.source: The current culture is indicated by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture> property.
trans-unit.target: 目前的文化特性會由<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string using the formatting conventions of a specific culture, call the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)> or the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用之特定文化特性的格式化慣例將字串剖析，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)>或<xref:System.DateTime.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)>多載。

trans-unit.source: This overload attempts to parse `s` by using <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載嘗試剖析`s`使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example parses the string representation of several date and time values by:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會剖析多個日期和時間值的字串表示：

trans-unit.source: Using the default format provider, which provides the formatting conventions of hte current thread culture of the computer used to produce the example output.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設的格式提供者，提供用來產生範例輸出的電腦的目前執行緒文化特性的格式設定慣例。

trans-unit.source: The output from this example reflects the formatting conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的輸出會反映 EN-US 文化特性的格式設定慣例。

trans-unit.source: Using the default style value, which is <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWIthType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設的樣式值，亦即<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWIthType>。

trans-unit.source: It handles the <xref:System.FormatException> exception that is thrown when the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time by using some other culture's formatting conventions.
trans-unit.target: 它會處理<xref:System.FormatException>方法嘗試使用其他文化特性剖析日期和時間的字串表示時，會擲回的例外狀況的格式化慣例。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to successfully parse a date and time value that does not use the formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何成功剖析日期和時間值，不會使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式設定慣例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: See [The string to parse](#StringToParse) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[要剖析的字串](#StringToParse)。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific format information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: See [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[剖析和文化特性慣例](#Culture)

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent by using culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定文化特性格式資訊，將日期和時間的字串表示轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" /> as specified by <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="provider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time zone information, this method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts the date and time in `s` to local time.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時區資訊，此方法會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，並將轉換的日期和時間在`s`本地時間。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it performs no time zone conversion and returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會執行任何時區轉換並傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This overload attempts to parse `s` by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載嘗試剖析`s`使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType>樣式。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example parses an array of date strings by using the conventions of the en-US, fr-FR, and de-DE cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用 EN-US FR-FR 及 DE-DE 文化特性的慣例，來剖析日期字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates that the string representations of a single date can be interpreted differently across different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 它會示範，單一日期的字串表示可以解譯以不同的方式跨不同的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: See [The string to parse](#StringToParse) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[要剖析的字串](#StringToParse)。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性特定格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: See [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[剖析和文化特性慣例](#Culture)

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c> for the parse operation to succeed, and that defines how to interpret the parsed date in relation to the current time zone or the current date.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示可以在 <c>s</c> 中出現使剖析作業成功，以及定義如何解譯剖析的日期與目前時區或目前日期之間關聯性的樣式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent by using culture-specific format information and a formatting style.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定文化特性格式資訊及格式樣式，將日期和時間的字串表示轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="provider" /> and <paramref name="styles" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="provider" /> 和 <paramref name="styles" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: This method overload converts the date and time in `s` and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法多載將轉換的日期和時間在`s`並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: 如果

trans-unit.source: Time zone conversion
trans-unit.target: 進行時區轉換

trans-unit.source: Kind property
trans-unit.target: Kind 屬性

trans-unit.source: `s` contains no time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含沒有時區資訊。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含時區資訊。

trans-unit.source: To the time in the local time zone
trans-unit.target: 本地時區的時間

trans-unit.source: `s` contains time zone information, and `styles includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含時區資訊和 ' 樣式包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標。

trans-unit.source: To Coordinated Univeral Time (UTC)
trans-unit.target: 以國際標準的時間 (UTC)

trans-unit.source: `s` contains the Z or GMT time zone designator, and `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `s` 包含 Z 或 GMT 時區指示項，並`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method and displays the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法，並顯示的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="styles" /> contains an invalid combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, both <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" /> 兩者。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match a specified format exactly or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合指定的格式，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A format specifier that defines the required format of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式規範，其定義 <c>s</c> 所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜備註＞一節。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific format information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent using the specified format and culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式以及特定文化特性的格式資訊，將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="format" /> 和 <paramref name="provider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the \<Date> and \<Time> elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`, and that `s` have no white space other than that permitted by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它也需要\<日期 > 和\<時間 > 日期和時間的字串表示的項目會出現在所指定的順序`format`，而且`s`不有非的允許任何空白字元`format`.

trans-unit.source: If `format` defines a date with no time element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> value has a time of midnight (00:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`定義日期任何時間元素和剖析作業成功時，所產生的<xref:System.DateTime>值具有午夜的時間 (00: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` defines a time with no date element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> value has a date of `DateTime.Now.Date`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`所定義的時間沒有任何日期項目與剖析作業成功時，所產生的<xref:System.DateTime>值具有日期`DateTime.Now.Date`。

trans-unit.source: If `s` does not represent a time in a particular time zone and the parse operation succeeds, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不的代表時間以特定的時區，剖析作業成功，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` does represent the time in a particular time zone and `format` allows time zone information to be present (for example, if `format` is equal to the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifiers, or if it contains the "z", "zz", or "zzz" custom format specifiers), the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`代表特定時區的時間和`format`允許必須存在的時區資訊 (例如，如果`format`相當於"o"、"r"或"u"標準格式規範，如果它包含"z"、"zz"或"zzz"自訂格式規範）<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `s`.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`s`。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) or [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)或[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is a custom format pattern that does not include date or time separators (such as "yyyyMMddHHmm"), use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是不包含日期或時間分隔符號 （例如"yyyyMMddHHmm")，使用的文化特性而異的自訂格式模式`provider`參數和寬形式的每個自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to specify hours in the format pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要指定時數的格式模式中，指定寬表單中，"HH"，而不是較窄的表單中，"H"。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和時間符號和字串 （例如一週中特定語言的名稱） 用於`s`會由`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表用來解譯的文化特性`s`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回的物件及其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`s`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns either the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式設定資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 或 <paramref name="format" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 或 <paramref name="format" /> 是空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a date and time that corresponds to the pattern specified in <paramref name="format" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不包含對應至 <paramref name="format" /> 中指定模式的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="s" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 中的小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" />方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不在協議中，如果包含要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中，AM/PM 指示項會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A format specifier that defines the required format of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式規範，其定義 <c>s</c> 所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜備註＞一節。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性特定格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that provides additional information about <c>s</c>, about style elements that may be present in <c>s</c>, or about the conversion from <c>s</c> to a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，提供有關 <c>s</c>、可以出現在 <c>s</c> 中的樣式元素，或是從 <c>s</c> 轉換成 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent using the specified format, culture-specific format information, and style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式、特定文化特性格式資訊以及樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合指定的格式，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="format" />, <paramref name="provider" />, and <paramref name="style" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="format" />、<paramref name="provider" /> 和 <paramref name="style" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the date and time elements in `s` appear in the order specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它也要求中的日期和時間的項目`s`所指定的順序顯示`format`。

trans-unit.source: If `s` does not match the pattern of the `format` parameter, with any variations defined by the `style` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`不符合的模式`format`參數，所定義的任何變化`style`參數，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析日期的任何一種格式提供者所辨識的格式的字串表示<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method also allows the date and time elements in `s` to appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法也允許的日期和時間的項目中`s`依任何順序出現。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`參數包含僅一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期會使用，除非`style`參數包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`參數包含的日期沒有時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置、 內部或尾端空白字元。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可以透過變更<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，它會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值的<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，它會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>其值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時區資訊，如有必要，時間會轉換為本地時間和<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and to set the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可以透過變更<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標將國際標準時間 (UTC) 轉換為本地時間，並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter defines the required pattern of the `s` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數會定義所需的模式`s`參數。

trans-unit.source: It can consist of either one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table.
trans-unit.target: 它可以包含一或多個自訂格式規範，從[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或單一標準格式規範，它會識別預先定義的模式，從[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用自訂格式模式中的日期或時間分隔符號，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和寬形式的每個自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要指定模式中，指定寬表單中，"HH"，而不是較窄的表單中，"H"。

trans-unit.source: Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for the parse operation to succeed, you can call the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and specify multiple permitted formats.
trans-unit.target: 不需要的`s`符合單一格式的剖析作業成功，您可以呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並指定多個允許的格式。

trans-unit.source: This makes the parse operation more likely to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 這樣更有可能成功，剖析作業。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation.
trans-unit.target: `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉型別，以決定是否和位置所未定義空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制精確的剖析作業行為。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how each member of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration affects the operation of the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何每個成員的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉型別會影響的作業<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成員

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 剖析`s`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, the method parses the string, calls <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> to convert the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value to UTC, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時區時差，或如果`s`未包含任何時區資訊但`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，方法會剖析字串，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>轉換傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值以 UTC並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或如果`s`不含時區資訊但`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，方法會剖析字串，不執行時區轉換針對傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值，並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the flag has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`之間任何個別的日期或時間項目可能會出現。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在開頭`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在結尾`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端空白字元未定義`format`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time.
trans-unit.target: 指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，則會假設為代表當地時間。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is present, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標已存在，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC.
trans-unit.target: 指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，它會假設來表示 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is present, the method converts the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value from UTC to local time and sets its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值與 utc 之間的當地時間和設定其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時間日期的詳細資訊，不傳回值的日期會設定為`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using default values.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會剖析使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 該位於以外的任何空格`format`允許。

trans-unit.source: If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to 1/1/0001.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`缺少傳回之日期的日期元件，<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為 1/1/0001。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果時區資訊存在於`s`，時間會轉換為本機時間而<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a <xref:System.DateTime> value date and time with its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 包含時區資訊的字串，請嘗試避免轉換為<xref:System.DateTime>值日期和時間以其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.
trans-unit.target: 主要，此旗標可避免 UTC 時間轉換為本地時間。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和時間符號和字串 （例如一週中特定語言的名稱） 用於`s`會由`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表用來解譯的文化特性`s`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回的物件及其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`s`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns either the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式設定資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the string " 5/01/2009 8:30 AM" cannot be parsed successfully when the `styles` parameter equals <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> because leading spaces are not allowed by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，字串"5/01/2009年上午 8:30"無法剖析成功時`styles`參數等於<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>所不允許前置空格，因此`format`。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the string "5/01/2009 09:00" cannot be parsed successfully with a `format` of "MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm" because the date string does not precede the month number with a leading zero, as `format` requires.
trans-unit.target: 此外，字串"5/01/2009年 09:00 」 無法以成功地剖析`format`的"MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm"因為日期字串前面沒有前置零，月份數字為`format`需要。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 或 <paramref name="format" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 或 <paramref name="format" /> 是空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a date and time that corresponds to the pattern specified in <paramref name="format" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不包含對應至 <paramref name="format" /> 中指定模式的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="s" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 中的小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不一致。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> contains an invalid combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, both <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" /> 兩者。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" />方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不在協議中，如果包含要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中，AM/PM 指示項會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: An array of allowable formats of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>s</c> 允許的格式陣列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜備註＞一節。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific format information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>s</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示允許的 <c>s</c> 格式。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> equivalent using the specified array of formats, culture-specific format information, and style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式陣列、特定文化特性格式資訊以及樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match at least one of the specified formats exactly or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須至少完全符合其中一個指定的格式，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time contained in <paramref name="s" />, as specified by <paramref name="formats" />, <paramref name="provider" />, and <paramref name="style" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="s" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="formats" />、<paramref name="provider" /> 和 <paramref name="style" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析符合指派給任何的模式一個日期的字串表示`formats`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the string `s` does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串`s`不符合任何一種模式與任何所定義的變化`styles`參數，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Aside from comparing `s` to multiple formatting patterns, rather than to a single formatting pattern, this overload behaves identically to the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 除了比較`s`至多個格式模式，而非單一的格式模式，這個多載的行為即會相同與<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`參數包含僅一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期會使用，除非`style`參數包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。

trans-unit.source: If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`參數包含的日期沒有時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`.
trans-unit.target: `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置、 內部或尾端空格字元而不是所允許的格式字串中的其中一個`formats`。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags, which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可以透過變更<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，它會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值的<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，它會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>其值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時區資訊，如有必要，時間會轉換為本地時間和<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可以透過變更<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標不當地時間轉換成國際標準時間 (UTC)，並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `formats`參數包含陣列的模式，其中`s`必須完全符合，剖析作業會成功。

trans-unit.source: The patterns in the `formats` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table.
trans-unit.target: 中的模式`formats`參數包含一個或多個自訂格式規範，從[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或單一標準格式規範，它會識別預先定義的模式，從[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未使用自訂格式模式中的日期或時間分隔符號，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和寬形式的每個自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要指定模式中，指定寬表單中，"HH"，而不是較窄的表單中，"H"。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation.
trans-unit.target: `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉型別，以決定是否和位置所未定義空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制精確的剖析作業行為。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how each member of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration affects the operation of the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何每個成員的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉型別會影響的作業<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成員

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 剖析`s`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, the method parses the string, calls <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> to convert the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value to UTC, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時區時差，或如果`s`未包含任何時區資訊但`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，方法會剖析字串，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>轉換傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值以 UTC並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或如果`s`不含時區資訊但`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，方法會剖析字串，不執行時區轉換針對傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值，並設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the flag has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`之間任何個別的日期或時間項目可能會出現。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在開頭`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: 指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在結尾`s`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端空白字元未定義`format`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time.
trans-unit.target: 指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，則會假設為代表當地時間。
