trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is present, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標已存在，<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC.
trans-unit.target: 指定當`s`缺少任何時區資訊，它會假設來表示 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is present, the method converts the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value from UTC to local time and sets its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值與 utc 之間的當地時間和設定其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含時間日期的詳細資訊，不傳回值的日期會設定為`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using default values.
trans-unit.target: `s`參數會剖析使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 該位於以外的任何空格`format`允許。

trans-unit.source: If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to 1/1/0001.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`缺少傳回之日期的日期元件，<xref:System.DateTime>值設定為 1/1/0001。

trans-unit.source: If `s` contains no time zone information, the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`包含沒有時區資訊<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果時區資訊存在於`s`，時間會轉換為本機時間而<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a date and time with its <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 包含時區資訊的字串，請嘗試 無法轉換成日期的日期和時間以其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.
trans-unit.target: 主要，此旗標可避免 UTC 時間轉換為本地時間。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和時間符號和字串 （例如一週中特定語言的名稱） 用於`s`會由`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表用來解譯的文化特性`s`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回的物件及其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`s`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns either the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.IFormatProvider>實作其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式設定資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to ensure that a string in a number of possible formats can be successfully parsed .
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以確定可以成功剖析中的可能格式的數字的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> or <paramref name="formats" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 或 <paramref name="formats" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
an element of <paramref name="formats" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="formats" /> 的某個項目是空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="s" /> does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any element of <paramref name="formats" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 不包含對應至 <paramref name="formats" /> 任何項目的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="s" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 中的小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不一致。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> contains an invalid combination of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 包含無效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, both <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal" /> 兩者。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTime.ParseExact" />方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不在協議中，如果包含要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中，AM/PM 指示項會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets the seconds component of the date represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體所表示日期的秒數元件。

trans-unit.source: The seconds component, expressed as a value between 0 and 59.
trans-unit.target: 秒數元件，以 0 到 59 之間的值表示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Second%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.Second%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A date and time.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the new object represents local time, UTC, or neither.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示新的物件表示本地時間、UTC，或兩者都不是。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that has the same number of ticks as the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, but is designated as either local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, as indicated by the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTimeKind" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件，此物件的刻度數與指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 相同，但依指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeKind" /> 值所示，指定為本地時間、國際標準時間 (Coordinated Universal Time，UTC)，或兩者都不是。

trans-unit.source: A new object that has the same number of ticks as the object represented by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter and the <see cref="T:System.DateTimeKind" /> value specified by the <paramref name="kind" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 新物件，這個物件的刻度數與 <paramref name="value" /> 參數代表的物件相同，且具有 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeKind" /> 參數指定的 <paramref name="kind" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object consists of a Kind field that indicates whether the time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a Ticks field that contains a time value measured in 100-nanosecond ticks.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>物件包含的類型 欄位，指出是否將時間值根據本地時間、 國際標準時間 (UTC) 或兩者皆否，而且包含時間值的刻度欄位以 100 奈秒刻度為單位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A> method creates a new <xref:System.DateTime> object using the specified `kind` parameter and the original time value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A>方法建立新<xref:System.DateTime>物件使用指定`kind`參數，而且原始時間值。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.DateTime> value does not represent the same instant in time as the `value` parameter, and <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A> is not a time zone conversion method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值不代表相同即時時間`value`參數，以及<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A>不是時區轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it leaves the time specified by the `value` parameter unchanged, and sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to `kind`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會保留所指定的時間`value`參數保持不變，與集<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性`kind`。

trans-unit.source: For information about time zone conversions, see [Converting Times Between Time Zones](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md).
trans-unit.target: 時區轉換的相關資訊，請參閱[之間時區間轉換時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A> method is useful in interoperability scenarios where you receive a <xref:System.DateTime> object with an unspecified Kind field, but you can determine by independent means that the Ticks field represents local time or UTC.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A>方法收到的互通性案例中很有用<xref:System.DateTime>物件未指定類型 欄位，但您可以判斷獨立表示刻度欄位代表本地時間或 UTC。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A> method to demonstrate how the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property influences the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> and <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> conversion methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A>方法，示範如何<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性會影響<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>和<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the specified time or duration from this instance.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體減去指定的時間或持續期間。

trans-unit.source: The date and time value to subtract.
trans-unit.target: 要減去的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the specified date and time from this instance.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體減去指定的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A time interval that is equal to the date and time represented by this instance minus the date and time represented by <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔，等於由此執行個體所表示的日期和時間減去由 <paramref name="value" /> 所表示的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29> method determines the difference between two dates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29>方法會判斷兩個日期之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: To subtract a time interval from the current instance, call the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 要減去的時間間隔，從目前的執行個體，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument.
trans-unit.target: 要減去目前的執行個體的特定時間間隔，呼叫的方法，將該時間間隔加入至目前的日期，並提供負值做為方法引數。

trans-unit.source: For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the <xref:System.DateTime.AddMonths%28System.Int32%29> method with a value of -2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要減去目前的日期的兩個月，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.AddMonths%28System.Int32%29>方法-2 的值。

trans-unit.source: If the date and time of the current instance is earlier than `value`, the method returns a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object that represents a negative time span.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間的目前執行個體是早於`value`，方法會傳回<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件，表示負的時間範圍。

trans-unit.source: That is, the value of all of its non-zero properties (such as <xref:System.TimeSpan.Days%2A> or <xref:System.TimeSpan.Ticks%2A>) is negative.
trans-unit.target: 也就是所有的非零屬性的值 (例如<xref:System.TimeSpan.Days%2A>或<xref:System.TimeSpan.Ticks%2A>) 是負數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29> method does not consider the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the two <xref:System.DateTime> values when performing the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29>方法不會考慮值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>兩個屬性<xref:System.DateTime>值時執行減法運算。

trans-unit.source: Before subtracting <xref:System.DateTime> objects, ensure that the objects represent times in the same time zone.
trans-unit.target: 之前減去<xref:System.DateTime>物件，請確認物件是否代表相同的時區中的時間。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the result will include the difference between time zones.
trans-unit.target: 否則，結果會包含時區之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method does consider the difference between time zones when performing the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法就會考慮執行減法運算時的時區之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A> method and the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A>方法和減法運算子。

trans-unit.source: The result is less than <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個結果小於 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> 或大於 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The time interval to subtract.
trans-unit.target: 要減去的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the specified duration from this instance.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體減去指定的持續期間。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equal to the date and time represented by this instance minus the time interval represented by <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，等於由此執行個體所表示的日期和時間減去由 <paramref name="value" /> 所表示的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29> method returns the date that is a specified time interval difference from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29>方法會傳回日期，這是目前的執行個體指定的時間間隔差。

trans-unit.source: To determine the time interval between two dates, call the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷兩個日期之間的時間間隔，請呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.DateTime%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument.
trans-unit.target: 要減去目前的執行個體的特定時間間隔，呼叫的方法，將該時間間隔加入至目前的日期，並提供負值做為方法引數。

trans-unit.source: For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the <xref:System.DateTime.AddMonths%28System.Int32%29> method with a value of -2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要減去目前的日期的兩個月，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.AddMonths%28System.Int32%29>方法-2 的值。

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the value of this <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會變更這個值<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it returns a new <xref:System.DateTime> whose value is the result of this operation.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會傳回新<xref:System.DateTime>其實此作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method subtracts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object that represents a positive time span and returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value that is earlier than the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會減去<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件，表示正的時間範圍，並傳回<xref:System.DateTime>之前的日期和時間的目前執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.TimeSpan> object represents a negative time span, the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value that is later than the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件都代表負的時間範圍內，<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>晚的日期和時間的目前執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method allows you to subtract a time interval that consists of more than one unit of time (such as a given number of hours and a given number of minutes).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可讓您要減去的時間，例如 （指定數字的時數） 和指定的分鐘數的多個單位所組成的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: To subtract a single unit of time (such as years, months, or days) from the <xref:System.DateTime> instance, you can pass a negative numeric value as a parameter to any of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 要減去的時間 （例如年、 月或日） 的單一單位從<xref:System.DateTime>執行個體，您可以負的數字值當做參數傳遞至任何下列方法：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddYears%2A>, to subtract a specific number of years from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddYears%2A>要減去特定數目的年份，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddMonths%2A>, to subtract a specific number of months from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddMonths%2A>要減去特定數目的月份，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddDays%2A>, to subtract a specific number of days from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddDays%2A>要減去目前的日期和時間執行個體在特定天數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddHours%2A>, to subtract a specific number of hours from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddHours%2A>要減去的時間會從目前的日期和時間執行個體的特定數字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddMinutes%2A>, to subtract a specific number of minutes from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddMinutes%2A>要減去的特定從目前的日期和時間執行個體的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddSeconds%2A>, to subtract a specific number of seconds from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddSeconds%2A>要減去特定的目前的日期和時間執行個體的秒數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddMilliseconds%2A>, to subtract a specific number of milliseconds from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddMilliseconds%2A>要減去特定數目的目前日期和時間執行個體 （毫秒）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTime.AddTicks%2A>, to subtract a specific number of ticks from the current date and time instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.AddTicks%2A>要減去為特定的目前的日期和時間執行個體的刻度數。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A> method and the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.Subtract%2A>方法和減法運算子。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示這個執行個體日期和時間的刻度數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 刻度數目，表示這個執行個體的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The value is between <see langword="DateTime.MinValue.Ticks" /> and <see langword="DateTime.MaxValue.Ticks" />.
trans-unit.target: 值介於 <see langword="DateTime.MinValue.Ticks" /> 和 <see langword="DateTime.MaxValue.Ticks" /> 之間。

trans-unit.source: A single tick represents one hundred nanoseconds or one ten-millionth of a second.
trans-unit.target: 單一刻度表示一百個奈秒或每秒的一個 10-百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: There are 10,000 ticks in a millisecond, or 10 million ticks in a second.
trans-unit.target: 沒有刻度 10,000 毫秒或 10 百萬個的每秒的刻度。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 (0:00:00 UTC on January 1, 0001, in the Gregorian calendar), which represents <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值代表 0001 年 1 月 1 日的 12:00:00 午夜以來已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數 (0: 00:00 年 1 月 1 日的 UTC 0001 西曆中)，表示<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It does not include the number of ticks that are attributable to leap seconds.
trans-unit.target: 它不包含是能歸因於 leap 秒的刻度的數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A> property to display the number of ticks that have elapsed since the beginning of the twenty-first century and to instantiate a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A>屬性若要顯示的第二十一世紀起已經過的刻度數以及具現化<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> object is then used to display the elapsed time using several other time intervals.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>物件會被用來顯示使用數個其他時間間隔的已耗用時間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time of day for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體的一天時間。

trans-unit.source: A time interval that represents the fraction of the day that has elapsed since midnight.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔，表示從午夜以來已經過的當天部分。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.DateTime.Date%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.DateTime.Date%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: which returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value that represents a date without its time component, the <xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A> property returns a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents a <xref:System.DateTime> value's time component.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值，表示日期，但沒有時間元件，<xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，表示<xref:System.DateTime>值的時間元件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to display the time of day or retrieve the string representation of the time of day of a <xref:System.DateTime> value, you can instead call an overload of the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A> method that has a `format` parameter or use the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature with the "t" or "T" standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要顯示的當日時間，或擷取的一天時間的字串表示<xref:System.DateTime>值，您可以改為呼叫的多載<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A>方法`format`參數或使用[複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) "t"或"T"標準格式字串的功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A> property for an array of <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的值<xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性的陣列<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: It also contrasts the return value with the string returned by the "t" standard format string in a composite formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也傳回值的相反複合格式化作業中的"t"標準格式字串所傳回的字串。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to a 64-bit binary value that subsequently can be used to recreate the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件序列化成 64 位元的二進位值，之後可以用這個值來重新建立 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer that encodes the <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> and <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Ticks" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元帶正負號的整數，可以編碼 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Ticks" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A> method to convert the value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object to a binary value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A>方法，將目前值轉換<xref:System.DateTime>二進位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Subsequently, use the binary value and the <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> method to recreate the original <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 接著，使用二進位值和<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>方法來重新建立原始<xref:System.DateTime>物件。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the <xref:System.DateTime> value returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> method is not identical to the original <xref:System.DateTime> value supplied to the <xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，<xref:System.DateTime>所傳回的值<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>方法不是與相同原始<xref:System.DateTime>值提供給<xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the next section, "Local Time Adjustment".
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下節中，「 本機時間調整 」。

trans-unit.source: Local Time Adjustment
trans-unit.target: 本機時間調整

trans-unit.source: A local time, which is a Coordinated Universal Time adjusted to the local time zone, is represented by a <xref:System.DateTime> structure whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property has the value <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 本地時間、 國際標準時間調整，以當地時區，由<xref:System.DateTime>結構其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性具有值<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

trans-unit.source: When restoring a local <xref:System.DateTime> value from the binary representation that is produced by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A> method, the <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> method may adjust the recreated value so that it is not equal to the original value.
trans-unit.target: 還原本機時<xref:System.DateTime>值所產生的二進位表示法<xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A>方法，<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>方法可能會調整重建後的值，使不等於原始值。

trans-unit.source: This can occur under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 在下列狀況下可能會發生這種情形：

trans-unit.source: If a local <xref:System.DateTime> object is serialized in one time zone by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A> method, and then deserialized in a different time zone by the <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> method, the local time represented by the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> object is automatically adjusted to the second time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果本機<xref:System.DateTime>物件由一個時區中序列化<xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A>方法，然後在不同的時區，由還原序列化和<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>方法，表示所產生的本機時間<xref:System.DateTime>物件會自動調整第二個時區中。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a <xref:System.DateTime> object that represents a local time of 3 P.M.
trans-unit.target: 例如，請考慮<xref:System.DateTime>物件，代表本地時間為下午 3。

trans-unit.source: An application that is executing in the U.S. Pacific Time zone uses the <xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A> method to convert that <xref:System.DateTime> object to a binary value.
trans-unit.target: 在美國太平洋時區中執行的應用程式太平洋時區使用<xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A>方法，以將其轉換<xref:System.DateTime>二進位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Another application that is executing in the U.S. Eastern Time zone uses the <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> method to convert the binary value to a new <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 在美國太平洋時區中執行的另一個應用程式美加東部時區使用<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>方法，將二進位值，轉換至新<xref:System.DateTime>物件。

trans-unit.source: The value of the new <xref:System.DateTime> object is 6 P.M., which represents the same point in time as the original 3 P.M.
trans-unit.target: 新的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件是下午 6 點，以時間為原始的下午 3 代表相同的點

trans-unit.source: value, but is adjusted to local time in the Eastern Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 值，但會以美國東部時區為準的當地時間調整。

trans-unit.source: If the binary representation of a local <xref:System.DateTime> value represents an invalid time in the local time zone of the system on which <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> is called, the time is adjusted so that it is valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果在本機的二進位表示法<xref:System.DateTime>值代表本地時區系統上的時間無效<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>是呼叫，時間會調整，以便有效。

trans-unit.source: For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間發生在美國太平洋時區太平洋時區在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間推進到上午 3:00 的一小時

trans-unit.source: This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone.
trans-unit.target: 這個小時間隔內會是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a binary value by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A> method and is then restored by the <xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A> method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示時的時間之內這個範圍會轉換為二進位值的<xref:System.DateTime.ToBinary%2A>方法，然後還原<xref:System.DateTime.FromBinary%2A>成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受限於修改傳遞至<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，為此範例會說明。

trans-unit.source: Version Considerations
trans-unit.target: 版本的考量

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, a <xref:System.DateTime> structure consists of a private Kind field, which indicates whether the specified time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a private Ticks field, which contains the number of 100-nanosecond ticks that specify a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 以.NET Framework 2.0 版中，啟動<xref:System.DateTime>結構包含私用的類型欄位，指出指定的時間值根據本地時間、 國際標準時間 (UTC) 或兩者皆非和私用的刻度欄位，其中包含指定的日期和時間的 100 奈秒刻度數目。

trans-unit.source: The Ticks field can be accessed with the <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A> property and the Kind field can be accessed with the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用可以存取刻度欄位<xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A>屬性和 [類型] 欄位可以使用存取<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Prior to the .NET Framework 2.0, if you serialized a <xref:System.DateTime> object manually instead of using a serialization interface such as <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you only needed to serialize the Ticks data in the <xref:System.DateTime> structure.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0，如果您序列化之前<xref:System.DateTime>物件手動而不是使用序列化介面，例如<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您只需要序列化中的刻度資料<xref:System.DateTime>結構。

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 2.0, you must also serialize the Kind data.
trans-unit.target: 從 2.0 版開始，您也必須序列化類型的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current date.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: An object that is set to today's date, with the time component set to 00:00:00.
trans-unit.target: 物件，設定為今天的日期，且時間元件設定為 00:00:00。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a <xref:System.DateTime> whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property returns <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，傳回值是<xref:System.DateTime>其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

trans-unit.source: Because it returns the current date without the current time, the <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A> property is suitable for use in applications that work with dates only.
trans-unit.target: 因為它會傳回目前的日期，但目前的時間，沒有<xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A>屬性是適用於只使用日期的應用程式中使用。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Choosing Between DateTime, DateTimeOffset, TimeSpan, and TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[選擇之間 DateTime、 DateTimeOffset、 TimeSpan 和 TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md)。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A> property returns the current time without the current date, and the <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> property returns both the current date and the current time.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性會傳回目前的時間，不含目前的日期，而<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>屬性會傳回目前的日期和目前的時間。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTime.Date%2A> property to retrieve the current date.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTime.Date%2A>屬性，以擷取目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: It also illustrates how a <xref:System.DateTime> value can be formatted using some of the standard date and time format strings.
trans-unit.target: 它也說明了如何<xref:System.DateTime>值可以使用某些標準日期和時間格式字串格式化。

trans-unit.source: Note that the output produced by the third call to the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method uses the g format specifier to include the time component, which is zero.
trans-unit.target: 請注意的第三個呼叫所產生的輸出<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法使用 g 格式規範來包含時間元件，也就是零。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換成 Windows 檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object expressed as a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 以 Windows 檔案時間表示的目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file.
trans-unit.target: Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A> method uses the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to determine whether the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a local time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.DateTime>物件是本地時間、 UTC 時間或未指定的一種會被視為本地時間的時間。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The resulting file time would represent a date and time before 12:00 midnight January 1, 1601 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 產生的檔案時間會代表西元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 之前的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: UTC.
trans-unit.target: UTC。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTime(System.Int64)" /> method restores a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTime" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，<see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTime(System.Int64)" />方法還原<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />所儲存的值<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTime" />方法。

trans-unit.source: However, the two values may differ under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 不過，在下列情況下的兩個值可能與不同：

trans-unit.source: If the serialization and deserialization of the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value occur in different time zones.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列化和還原序列化<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />值偏高，在不同時區。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value with a time of 12:30 P.M.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />時間為下午 12:30 的值

trans-unit.source: in the U.S. Eastern Time zone is serialized, and then deserialized in the U.S. Pacific Time zone, the original value of 12:30 P.M.
trans-unit.target: 在美國太平洋時區美加東部時區是序列化的而且在美國太平洋時區然後還原序列化太平洋時區，下午 12:30 的原始值

trans-unit.source: is adjusted to 9:30 A.M.
trans-unit.target: 會調整為上午 9:30

trans-unit.source: to reflect the difference between the two time zones.
trans-unit.target: 以反映兩個時區之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that is serialized represents an invalid time in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />序列化的值代表本地時區中無效的時間。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTime" /> method adjusts the restored <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value so that it represents a valid time in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTime" />方法調整還原<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />值，使其以當地時區表示有效的時間。

trans-unit.source: For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間發生在美國太平洋時區太平洋時區在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間推進到上午 3:00 的一小時

trans-unit.source: This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone.
trans-unit.target: 這個小時間隔內會是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a long integer value by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTime" /> method and is then restored by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTime(System.Int64)" /> method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示時間的年份時的長整數值轉換此範圍<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTime" />方法，然後還原<see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTime(System.Int64)" />成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the <see cref="M:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime(System.DateTime)" /> method, as the example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受限於修改傳遞至<see cref="M:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime(System.DateTime)" />方法，為此範例會說明。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換成 Windows 檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object expressed as a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 以 Windows 檔案時間表示的目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file.
trans-unit.target: Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc%2A> method uses the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property to determine whether the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a UTC time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性來判斷是否目前<xref:System.DateTime>物件是本地時間、 UTC 時間或未指定的類型的時間會被視為 UTC 時間。

trans-unit.source: If it is a local time, it converts the time to UTC before performing the conversion to a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 如果是當地時間，它將時間轉換成 UTC 執行成 Windows 檔案時間轉換之前。

trans-unit.source: The resulting file time would represent a date and time before 12:00 midnight January 1, 1601 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 產生的檔案時間會代表西元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 之前的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: UTC.
trans-unit.target: UTC。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc" /> method is sometimes used to convert a local time to UTC, and subsequently to restore it by calling the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTimeUtc(System.Int64)" /> method followed by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc" />方法有時候會將本地時間轉換成 UTC，並接著還原藉由呼叫<see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTimeUtc(System.Int64)" />後面接著方法<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" />方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if the original time represents an invalid time in the local time zone, the two local time values will not be equal.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果原始時間代表本地時區的時間無效，兩個的當地時間值不會相等。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to local time.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換成本地時間。

trans-unit.source: An object whose <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property is <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Local" />, and whose value is the local time equivalent to the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object, or <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" /> if the converted value is too large to be represented by a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object, or <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> if the converted value is too small to be represented as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 屬性為 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Local" />，而其值為與目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值相等的本地時間；如果轉換過的值太大，而無法由 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" /> 物件表示，則為 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />；如果轉換過的值太小，而無法表示為 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" /> 物件，則為 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The local time is equal to the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time plus the UTC offset.
trans-unit.target: 本地時間等於 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時間再加上的 UTC 位移。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the UTC offset, see <xref:System.TimeZone.GetUtcOffset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細的 UTC 位移的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.TimeZone.GetUtcOffset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換也會考量適用於由目前時間的日光節約時間規則<xref:System.DateTime>物件。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from UTC to local time.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法會轉換為本地時間 UTC 時，辨識只在目前的調整規則。

trans-unit.source: As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between UTC and local time.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，轉換為目前的調整規則生效之前的期間，可能不會正確反映 UTC 與本地時間之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method is determined by the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，所傳回的值開始<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法由<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.DateTime>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible results.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明可能的結果。

trans-unit.source: Kind
trans-unit.target: 類型

trans-unit.source: Results
trans-unit.target: 結果

trans-unit.source: This instance of <xref:System.DateTime> is converted to local time.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體<xref:System.DateTime>轉換為當地時間。

trans-unit.source: No conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 不會執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: This instance of <xref:System.DateTime> is assumed to be a UTC time, and the conversion is performed as if <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> were <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc>.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體<xref:System.DateTime>假設為 UTC 時間，會執行轉換，如同<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>已<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method converts a <xref:System.DateTime> value from UTC to local time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法轉換<xref:System.DateTime>從 UTC 到本地時間值。

trans-unit.source: To convert the time in any designated time zone to local time, use the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將任何指定的時區時間轉換為本地時間，使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the conversion is a <xref:System.DateTime> whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property always returns <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所傳回的值是<xref:System.DateTime>其<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性一律會傳回<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, a valid result is returned even if <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> is applied repeatedly to the same <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的結果傳回的結果，即使<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>重複套用至相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the exact output depends on the current culture and the local time zone of the system on which it is run.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，確切的輸出取決於目前的文化特性和本機系統執行所在的時區。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A> method to demonstrate how the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property influences the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> and <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A> conversion methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A>方法，示範如何<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性會影響<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>和<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A>轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" /> method to restore a local date and time value that was converted to UTC by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime" /> or <see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTimeUtc(System.Int64)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" />方法還原本地日期和時間值，轉換成 UTC 的<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime" />或<see cref="M:System.DateTime.FromFileTimeUtc(System.Int64)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if the original time represents an invalid time in the local time zone, it will not match the restored value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果原始時間代表本地時區的時間無效，它不會符合已還原的值。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" /> method converts a time from UTC to the local time zone, it also adjusts the time so that is valid in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 當<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" />方法將時間與 utc 之間的當地時區，它也會因此也就是有效的時間調整以當地時區。

trans-unit.source: For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間發生在美國太平洋時區太平洋時區在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間推進到上午 3:00 的一小時

trans-unit.source: This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone.
trans-unit.target: 這個小時間隔內會是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to UTC by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime" /> method and is then restored by the <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" /> method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示時的時間之內這個範圍會轉換成 UTC 的<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime" />方法，然後還原<see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime" />成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the <see cref="M:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime(System.DateTime)" /> method, as the example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受限於修改傳遞至<see cref="M:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime(System.DateTime)" />方法，為此範例會說明。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent long date string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的完整日期 (Long Date) 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the long date string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，內含目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的完整日期字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is formatted using the pattern defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property associated with the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "D" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是藉由指定"D"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLongDateString%2A> method is culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串<xref:System.DateTime.ToLongDateString%2A>方法會區分文化特性。

trans-unit.source: It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 它反映出目前的文化特性所定義的模式<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the en-US culture, the standard long date pattern is "dddd, MMMMdd, yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dddd, d.
trans-unit.target: 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的完整日期模式為"dddd，MMMMdd，yyyy";DE-DE 文化特性，它為"dddd，d。

trans-unit.source: MMMMyyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy'?'M'?'d'?'".
trans-unit.target: MMMMyyyy";若為 JA-JP 文化特性則是"yyyy'？ 'M'？ 'd'？ ' 」。

trans-unit.source: The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard long date format string.
trans-unit.target: 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，因此不同於標準的完整日期格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the current thread culture, see the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLongDateString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ToLongDateString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent long time string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的完整時間 (Long Time) 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the long time string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，內含目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的完整時間字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is formatted using the pattern defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property associated with the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "T" [standard date and time format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是藉由指定"T"傳回的值相同[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLongTimeString%2A> method is culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串<xref:System.DateTime.ToLongTimeString%2A>方法會區分文化特性。

trans-unit.source: It reflects the pattern defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A> property of the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 它反映出所定義的模式<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A>屬性目前的文化特性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the en-US culture, the standard long time pattern is "h:mm:ss tt"; for the de-DE culture, it is "HH:mm:ss"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "H:mm:ss".
trans-unit.target: 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的完整時間模式是 「 h:mm: ss tt";DE-DE 文化特性，則是"Hh: mm:;"若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它可以是"H:mm: ss"。

trans-unit.source: The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard long time format string.
trans-unit.target: 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，讓不同於標準的完整時間格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the current thread culture, see the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLongTimeString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ToLongTimeString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of this instance to the equivalent OLE Automation date.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體的值轉換為相等的 OLE Automation 日期。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to the value of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，含有等於這個執行個體值的 OLE Automation 日期。

trans-unit.source: An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose integral component is the number of days before or after midnight, 30 December 1899, and whose fractional component represents the time on that day divided by 24.
trans-unit.target: OLE Automation 日期會實作為浮點數，其不可或缺的元件之前或之後午夜，30 1899 年的日數，且其小數部分代表在除以 24 那一天的時間。

trans-unit.source: For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25.
The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899.
trans-unit.target: 基底 OLE Automation 日期為午夜，30 1899 年。

trans-unit.source: The minimum OLE Automation date is midnight, 1 January 0100.
trans-unit.target: OLE Automation 日期的下限為 1 年 1 月 0100年的午夜。

trans-unit.source: The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the last moment of 31 December 9999.
trans-unit.target: 最大 OLE Automation 日期等同於<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>、 31 年 12 月的最後一刻 9999。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ToOADate%2A> method throws an <xref:System.OverflowException> if the current instance represents a date that is later than <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> and earlier than midnight on January1, 0100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ToOADate%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>如果目前的執行個體代表日期晚於<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>及更早的版本比 0100 January1，在午夜。

trans-unit.source: However, if the value of the current instance is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>, the method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果目前的執行個體的值為<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>，方法會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).
trans-unit.target: 如需 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的值無法表示為 OLE Automation 日期。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent short date string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的簡短日期 (Short Date) 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the short date string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，內含目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的簡短日期字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is formatted using the pattern defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property associated with the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "d" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是藉由指定"d"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToShortDateString%2A> method is culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串<xref:System.DateTime.ToShortDateString%2A>方法會區分文化特性。

trans-unit.source: It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 它反映出目前的文化特性所定義的模式<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short date pattern is "M/d/yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dd.MM.yyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy/M/d".
trans-unit.target: 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的簡短日期模式是"yyyy/m /";DE-DE 文化特性，它會是"dd。MM.yyyy";若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它是"yyyy/M/d"。

trans-unit.source: The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short date format string.
trans-unit.target: 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，因此不同於標準的簡短日期格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the current thread culture, see the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ToShortDateString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ToShortDateString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It also shows that the result of calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ToShortDateString%2A> method is identical to calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with "d" as the format parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToShortDateString%2A>方法等同於呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>具有"d"格式參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent short time string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的簡短時間 (Short Time) 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the short time string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，內含目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的簡短時間字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is formatted using the pattern defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property associated with the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件使用所定義的模式進行格式化<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "t" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是藉由指定"t"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToShortTimeString%2A> method is culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的字串<xref:System.DateTime.ToShortTimeString%2A>方法會區分文化特性。

trans-unit.source: It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 它反映出目前的文化特性所定義的模式<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short time pattern is "h:mm tt"; for the de-DE culture, it is "HH:mm"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "H:mm".
trans-unit.target: 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的簡短時間模式是 「 h:mm tt";DE-DE 文化特性，則是"Hh: mm"。若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它是"H:mm"。

trans-unit.source: The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short time format string.
trans-unit.target: 特定電腦上特定的格式字串也可以自訂，因此不同於標準的簡短時間格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the current thread culture, see the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需目前的執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 多個它們產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DateTime.ToShortTimeString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.DateTime.ToShortTimeString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前文化特性的格式化慣例，將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件值的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G').
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件的格式會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G')。

trans-unit.source: To format it using a specific date and time format specifier, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定使用特定的日期和時間格式規範的格式，請呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: To format it using the general date and time format specifier ('G') for a specific culture, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化特定文化特性會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G')，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: To format it using a specific date and time format specifier and the conventions of a specific culture, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要格式化使用的特定日期和時間格式規範和特定文化特性的慣例，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用衍生自目前的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: In particular, it combines the custom format strings returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat` property.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，它結合了所傳回的自訂格式字串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat`屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A> method enable you to specify the culture whose formatting to use and to define the output pattern of the <xref:System.DateTime> value.
trans-unit.target: 其他多載<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A>方法可讓您指定的文化特性的格式，若要使用，並定義輸出的模式<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how the string representation of a <xref:System.DateTime> value returned by the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString> method depends on the thread current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何的字串表示<xref:System.DateTime>所傳回的值<xref:System.DateTime.ToString>方法取決於目前執行緒的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: It changes the current thread culture from en-US to fr-FR to ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: 它 EN-US 從目前的執行緒文化特性變更為 FR-FR 為 JA-JP。

trans-unit.source: and in each case calls the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString> method to return the string representation of a date and time value using that culture.
trans-unit.target: 並在每個情況下呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToString>方法來傳回日期和時間值，使用該文化特性的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間超出目前文化特性使用之曆法所支援的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToString" /> method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToString" />方法會傳回目前文化特性所使用的行事曆中的日期和時間的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> instance is earlier than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> or later than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />, the method throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的值<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />執行個體是早於<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />或更晚<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />，方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar" /> class when the current culture is Arabic (Syria).
trans-unit.target: 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式<see cref="T:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar" />類別目前的文化特性為阿拉伯文 （敘利亞） 時。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的特定文化特性格式資訊，將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object as specified by <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件值的字串表示，如 <paramref name="provider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref:System.DateTime> object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'), which formats output using the short date pattern and the long time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.DateTime>物件的格式會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G') 的格式化輸出使用簡短日期模式和完整時間模式。

trans-unit.source: The format of the short date and long time pattern is defined by the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 簡短日期和完整時間模式的格式由所定義`provider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示傳回的字串中反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 自訂物件實作<xref:System.IFormatProvider>介面。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式設定資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the string representation of a date and time using <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects that represent five different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示日期和時間使用的字串表示<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表五個不同的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: 日期與時間超出 <paramref name="provider" /> 使用之日曆所支援的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)" /> method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the culture represented by the <paramref name="provider" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DateTime.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)" />方法傳回的日期和時間的字串表示中所代表的文化特性所使用的行事曆<paramref name="provider" />參數。

trans-unit.source: Its calendar is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 其行事曆由定義<see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> instance is earlier than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> or later than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />, the method throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的值<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />執行個體是早於<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />或更晚<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />，方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式<see cref="T:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar" />類別。

trans-unit.source: A standard or custom date and time format string.
trans-unit.target: 標準或自訂的日期和時間格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和目前文化特性的格式化慣例，將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object as specified by <paramref name="format" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件值的字串表示，如 <paramref name="format" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29> method returns the string representation of a date and time value in a specific format that uses the formatting conventions of the current culture; for more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29>方法傳回的字串表示的日期和時間值中使用目前文化特性; 如需詳細資訊的格式設定慣例的特定格式，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數應該包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，定義傳回之字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the general format specifier, 'G', is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是`null`或是空字串，一般格式規範，而 'G'，會使用。

trans-unit.source: Some uses of this method include:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的一些用法包括：

trans-unit.source: Getting a string that displays the date and time in the current culture’s short date and time format.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串中目前的文化特性的簡短日期和時間格式顯示日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you use the "G" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以使用"G"格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Getting a string that contains only the month and year.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，包含只在月份和年份。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you use the "MM/yyyy" format string.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以使用 「 MM/yyyy"格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The format string uses the current culture’s date separator.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串會使用目前文化特性之日期分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Getting a string that contains the date and time in a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，包含的日期和時間以特定格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the "MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm" format string displays the date and time string in a fixed format such as "19//03//2013 18:06".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm"格式字串的日期和時間字串的固定格式顯示這類"19 的 / 03 / / 2013年 18:06"。

trans-unit.source: The format string uses "/" as a fixed date separator regardless of culture-specific settings.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串會使用"/"做為固定的日期分隔符號，不論特定文化特性設定為何。

trans-unit.source: Getting a date in a condensed format that could be used for serializing a date string.
